title: 651 Happy the Home That Welcomes You

lines: 1. Happy the home that welcomes You, Lord Jesus, Truest of friends, most honoured guest of all, Where hearts and eyes are bright with joy to greet You, Your lightest wishes eager to fulfil.
2. Happy the home where man and wife together Are of one mind believing in Your love: Through love and pain, prosperity and hardship, Through good and evil days Your care they prove.
3. Happy the home, O loving Friend of children, Where they are givâ€™n to You with hands of prayer, Where at Your feet they early learn to listen To Your own words, and thank You for Your care.
